definition: a block/body of person or animal as a block
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: The porous nickel was fabricated by using the jet electrodeposition.
sentences.chinese: 採用噴射電沉積方法制備塊體多孔鎳。

sentences.english: The lowest megalayer is the low-density block basement.
sentences.chinese: 最下層是低密度塊體基底層。

sentences.english: This paper consideres the problem of a wave period when the weight of units was designed.
sentences.chinese: 在設計塊體重量時，應考慮波浪週期問題。

sentences.english: Resolving kernels and standard errors can also be computed for each block .
sentences.chinese: 還可以計算每個塊體的分辨核和標準誤差。

sentences.english: The energy of an earthquake results from the power differences of block bumping or rubbing.
sentences.chinese: 地震能量來自於塊體間撞擊或摩擦時損失的動能。

sentences.english: The obtained displacements can be used for further deformation analysis of each tectonic block.
sentences.chinese: 得到的這種位移可作爲各塊體變形分析的基礎。

sentences.english: Only when these clumps are broken up is the dust liberated.
sentences.chinese: 只有這些塊體被打破，塵埃才能得到“解放“。

sentences.english: A computation model for ideal filling block mass was presented to achieve the most favorable compressibility of the fillings.
sentences.chinese: 給出了具有最佳壓縮性能的理想充填塊體的計算模型。

sentences.english: Ti -modified silica gel monolithic adsorbent was prepared by impregnation-deposition method.
sentences.chinese: 採用浸漬沉積法制得鈦改性硅膠塊體吸附劑。

sentences.english: The effects of hydrogen on the resistivity and the electron binding energy were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氫對塊體非晶合金電子結合能和電阻率的影響。

sentences.english: A three-dimensional elasto-viscoplastic hierarchical block element method for rock mass is developed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了巖體的三維彈粘塑性階譜塊體單元法。

sentences.english: The explosive welding of preparing bulk metallic glass composites by amorphous foils is first to be discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對非晶薄帶爆炸焊接製備塊體非晶複合進行討論。

sentences.english: The architects liken the shape the blocks create to a mausoleum and a space capsule.
sentences.chinese: 建築師們把塊體的形狀比作陵墓和太空艙。

sentences.english: This mentioned building was a simple block building, inserted into a narrow street of row houses.
sentences.chinese: 這是一座插入一排狹窄街區平房的簡單的塊體建築。

sentences.english: The threshold of the fatigue crack initiation from the notch of the microbeam is close to that of the bulk material.
sentences.chinese: 疲勞裂紋從尖缺口處萌生的門檻值接近塊體材料。

sentences.english: The gneiss has been altered in to yellow-grey rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 片麻岩蝕變後呈黃褐色塊體。
